doc:
Polly Holliday https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Polly_Holliday 0 Polly Dean Holliday (born July 2, 1937) is an American actress who has appeared on stage, television and in film. She is best known for her portrayal of sassy waitress Florence Jean "Flo" Castleberry on the 1970s sitcom Alice, which she reprised in its short-lived spin-off, Flo. Her character's tagline of "Kiss my grits!" remains perhaps the most memorable line associated with the series Alice. Polly_Dean_Holliday ( born July_2_,_1937 ) is an_American_actress who has_appeared on stage_,_television and in film .
